transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, [unintelligible] bolna tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aaj sir ek meeting karna tha aapse discuss karne ke liye senior ke saath.
Customer: Kis cheez ke liye discuss karna hai?
Executive: A, wohi jo inquiry wagera ke leke aur jo aapke paas jo issues aa rahe hai na, jo response achha nahi mil raha hai.
Customer: Uske regarding.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To hamare senior. Ye to ho chuka hai kitne baar discuss.
Executive: Nahi, kal sir se hamari baat hui thi, a, ki hamare senior ki, unhone bola tha ki theek hai kal 12:00 baje inse discuss karke unko guide kijiye.
Executive: Theek hai na? Hum ye nahi chahte hai ki service ko discontinue karna, lekin agar response achha milega to phir hum aage bhi further continue karenge. To usi ke liye unhone bola tha ki kal dopahar mein meeting schedule kar lijiyega aur discuss kar lijiyega hamari team se.
Customer: Haan, sir discussion kya karna kya hai?
Executive: Video meeting hogi aur isme hum discuss kar lenge jo bhi hamare inquiries ja rahi hai na, usme kya ho raha hai isme customer ke saath kya baat ho rahi hai woh hum on the call pe discuss kar lenge aur uske basis pe hum feedback aage process karenge.
Customer: To mujhe kya karna hai?
Executive: Aap bata dijiye abhi kitne der mein hum connect kar le video meeting ke dauran. Aap system pe rahiyega, hum bhi log system pe rahenge aur discuss kar lenge.
Customer: Sir pehle website ka lead bhejo do teen.
Executive: Theek hai, main do teen lead lu.
Customer: Theek hai, do teen lead usse baat karu. Mere paas aur bhi saat aath pichle saat 10 12 15 din ke lead maine liya hai website se ek bhi nahi aaya hai. Theek hai, sab within one two pe.
Executive: Ussi ke liye, ussi ke liye baat karne ke liye humne baat kar rahe hai. To aap aaj abhi 1:00 baj raha hai. Aap ek kaam karo 15 se 20 minute mein agar confirm kar do phir main usi time pe aapko ek video meeting link share kar dunga aur mere senior bhi rahenge aur phir uske basis pe hum aapse discuss kar lenge kya kya karna hai, kaise use karna hai, kaise follow karna hai, on the spot kuch inquiry hoga us pe bhi hum bahar se baat karenge aur woh sari cheeze ko feedback.
Customer: Haan, theek hai, haan, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. To kitne, kitne din mein main aapko connect kar lu?
Customer: Chalo do teen ghante baad kar sakte ho.
Executive: Sir do teen ghante time bataiye abhi 1:00 baj raha hai to hum kitne baje connect kar le?
Customer: 2:00 baje karo.
Executive: 2:00 baje. Theek hai sir. 2:00 baje main aapko isi number se call karunga aur video meeting link share kar dunga aap join kar lijiyega. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good response on buyleads.

- Wants website leads before meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive scheduled a video meeting at 2:00 PM.

- Executive will share a video meeting link.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call at 2:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, meeting, follow up
